name: P.S We Are Watching
description:
My prompt was "You thought you were the last person on Earth. Today you found out that might not be true." to achieve this narrative I decide that the player would find letters addressed to them and if you pay attention there is a girl in a gas mask dangling from the exit points.

I enjoyed making the enemy animations the most, how much time everything took was the least enjoyable part just because of thesis and all that jazz. I wish I spent more time on literally all of it.
